pattern.title: External adapter type not a base type

rule.context: xs:*[(self::xs:extension or self::xs:restriction) and (some $base-qname in resolve-QName(@base, .), $base-namespace in namespace-uri-from-QName($base-qname) satisfies nf:get-target-namespace(.) = $base-namespace)]
rule.assert: Rule 9-52: An adapter type definition MUST NOT be a base type definition.
